actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to eliminate the annual numerical limitation on visas for certain immigrants, to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to grant work authorization to certain immigrants with a pending application for nonimmigrant status under such Act, and for other purposes.
short_title: Immigrant Witness and Victim Protection Act of 2024

titles.title: Immigrant Witness and Victim Protection Act of 2024
Immigrant Witness and Victim Protection Act of 2024

To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to eliminate the annual numerical limitation on visas for certain immigrants, to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to grant work authorization to certain immigrants with a pending application for nonimmigrant status under such Act, and for other purposes.
